titleStmt.title: A paraenesis to the Prince by VVilliam Alexander of Menstrie
titleStmt.author: Stirling, William Alexander, Earl of, 1567 or 8-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field for Edvvard Blount,

notesStmt.note: The Prince = Henry, Prince of Wales.
Probably issued as part of: The monarchick tragedies: London, 1604.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
